metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41841 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through 1.6.0-639. A NULL pointer dereference occurs in AP4_File::ParseStream in Core/Ap4File.cpp, which is called from AP4_File::AP4_File.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
